info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:56PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Rensselaer County through 430 PM EDT... At 356 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Averill Park, or near Troy, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nassau, Stephentown, Wyantskill, Averill Park, West Sand Lake, Wynantskill, North Greenbush, Brunswick, Sand Lake, Poestenkill, East Nassau, Totem Lodge, Garfield, East Poestenkill, North Stephentown, Quackenkill, Albia, West Stephentown, Jacks Corners and Hoag Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
